SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.repositories

Class AppraisalRepository

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.repositories.AbstractRepository<AppraisalEntity>
pt.uc.dei.repositories.AppraisalRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AppraisalRepository extends AbstractRepository<AppraisalEntity>
Repository class for managing AppraisalEntity persistence operations.

Provides data access methods specific to appraisal entities, extending the basic CRUD operations from AbstractRepository. This class handles all database interactions related to appraisal management.

See Also:

    • findAppraisalByUsersAndCycle

      public AppraisalEntity findAppraisalByUsersAndCycle(Long appraisedUserId, Long appraisingUserId, Long cycleId)
      Finds an appraisal by appraised user, appraising user and cycle. Used to check for duplicates before creating new appraisals.
      Parameters:
      appraisedUserId - The appraised user ID
      appraisingUserId - The appraising user ID
      cycleId - The cycle ID
      Returns:
      AppraisalEntity if found, null otherwise

    • findAppraisalsWithFilters

      public List<AppraisalEntity> findAppraisalsWithFilters(Long appraisedUserId, String appraisedUserName, String appraisedUserEmail, Long appraisingUserId, String appraisingUserName, String appraisingUserEmail, Long cycleId, AppraisalState state, AppraisalParameter parameter, OrderBy order, Integer limit, Integer offset)
      Finds appraisals with advanced filtering options.
      Parameters:
      appraisedUserId - Optional filter by appraised user ID
      appraisingUserId - Optional filter by appraising user ID
      cycleId - Optional filter by cycle ID
      state - Optional filter by appraisal state
      limit - Maximum number of results (optional)
      offset - Starting position for pagination (optional)
      Returns:
      List of filtered appraisals
